咬人狗兒不露齒.pinyin: yao3 ren2 gou3 r5 bu4 lu4 chi3
咬人狗兒不露齒.definition: lit. the dog that bites does not show its fangs (idiom); fig. You can't tell the really dangerous enemy from his external appearance.

咬人的狗不露齒.pinyin: yao3 ren2 de5 gou3 bu4 lou4 chi3
咬人的狗不露齒.definition: lit. the dog that bites doesn't show its teeth (idiom); fig. the most sinister of people can look quite harmless

咬合.definition: (of uneven surfaces) to fit together; (of gear wheels) to mesh; (dentistry) occlusion; bite

咬唇妝.definition: bitten-lips look (darker lipstick applied on the inner part of the lips, and lighter on the outer part)

咬嚼.definition: to chew; to masticate; to ruminate; to mull over

咬字.definition: to pronounce (clearly or otherwise); to enunciate

咬定牙根.definition: see 咬緊牙關|咬紧牙关[yao3jin3-ya2guan1]

咬定牙關.definition: see 咬緊牙關|咬紧牙关[yao3jin3-ya2guan1]

咬文嚼字.definition: to bite words and chew characters (idiom); punctilious about minutiae of wording

咬牙.definition: to clench one's teeth; to grind the teeth; gnaw

咬牙切齒.definition: (idiom) to gnash one's teeth; to fume with rage

咬緊牙根.definition: see 咬緊牙關|咬紧牙关[yao3jin3-ya2guan1]

咬緊牙關.definition: (idiom) to grit one's teeth tightly; (idiom) (fig.) to endure pain or suffering; to bite the bullet

咬舌自盡.definition: to commit suicide by biting off one's tongue

咬鉤.definition: (of fish) to bite; to take the bait

咬齧.definition: variant of 咬嚙|咬啮[yao3 nie4]; to gnaw
